# Tender Announcement: Office Furniture for London Office
==============================

### Tender Reference: cb-636-60790236

#### Notice Publication and Closing Date

* Publication Date: June 14, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2024, 14:00 (EST)
* Amendment Date: June 28, 2024

#### Tender Details

* Tender Title: Office Furniture for London Office
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* UNSPSC Code: 56101700 (Office Furniture)
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Supplier Requirements

* The Public Prosecution Service of Canada (PPSC) is seeking suppliers to provide office furniture for the London office.
* The requirement includes:
	+ Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
	+ Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
	+ Support Space - Collaborative Furniture

#### Site Visit and Inspection

* A site visit is scheduled for June 21, 2024, from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM.

#### Procurement Details

* This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
* The procurement is also set aside from international trade agreements under the provision for small and minority businesses.

#### Contact Information

* Name: Jessica Roy-Labelle
* Email: [jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 550-9703
* Address: 160 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0H8, Canada
